detectors.description:
BrainFarm.earned(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BrainFarm.sol#611-614) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-points[account].add(blockTime.sub(lastUpdateTime[account]).mul(1e18).div(86400).mul(balanceOf(account).div(1e18))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BrainFarm.sol#613)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BrainFarm.redeem(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BrainFarm.sol#645-651):
	External calls:
	- IBrainLootbox(LootboxAddress).redeem(_lootbox,_msgSender()) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BrainFarm.sol#649)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- points[_msgSender()] = points[_msgSender()].sub(price) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BrainFarm.sol#650)
